sep.gen_dbgtable: TABLE DE SYMBOLES DE DÉBOGAGE GÉNÉRÉE

dbg.missing_sym: UNABLE TO LAUNCH DEBUGGER DUE TO MISSING SYMBOLS
dbg.no_info_found: NO DEBUG INFORMATION COULD BE RETRIEVED
dbg.trace: L'exception pouvait été tracer jusqu'à la ligne suivante ou celles qui l'entourent:

general.no_input: Aucun fichier d'entrée n'a été donné. Utilisez l'option de la ligne de commande '-?' ou '--help' pour voir les informations d'utilisation.
general.inputfile_nfound: Le fichier AutoIt d'entrée '{0}' n'a pas pu être trouvé.
general.file_nopen: Le fichier donné n'a pas pu être trouvé, accédé ou lu.
general.reserved_name: Le nom '{0}' est réservé à un usage interne ou futur.
general.invalid_targetsys: L'argument '{0}' n'est pas un système cible valide.
general.invalid_architecture: L'argument '{0}' n'est pas une architecture valide.
general.invalid_resolve: Le chemin '{0}' n'a pas pu être résolu dans un fichier.

preproc.include_nfound: Le fichier include '{0}' n'a pas pu être trouvé ou est inaccessible.
preproc.directive_invalid: La directive '{0}' est soit invalide, soit non prise en charge actuellement.
preproc.directive_invalid_value: La valeur '{0}' est invalide pour la directive '{1}'.
preproc.pragma_unsupported: L'option pragma '{0}' n'est actuellement pas supportée.
preproc.function_nesting: Une fonction ne peut pas être déclarée à l'intérieur d'une autre fonction.
preproc.unexpected_endfunc: Une fonction doit être déclarée avec 'Func ...' avant de pouvoir être fermée avec 'EndFunc'.
preproc.function_exists: Une fonction nommée '{0}' a déjà été déclarée (voir {1}).
preproc.block_reqr: L'énoncé actuel doit être directement dans l'une des portées suivantes: '{0}'
preproc.block_confl: L'instruction courante ne peut pas être placée directement dans l'un des blocs suivants: '{0}'.
preproc.block_invalid_close: Aucun bloc {0} existant ne peut être fermé. Veuillez en créer un afin de le fermer ou de supprimer la déclaration de clôture.
preproc.block_conflicting_close: Le bloc actuellement ouvert {0} ne peut pas être fermé avec une déclaration '{1}'.
preproc.blocks_unclosed: Il y a des blocs de contrôle ouverts qui doivent être fermés avant d'utiliser 'EndFunc'. Veuillez utiliser (dans l'ordre) les instructions '{0}' pour fermer les blocs ouverts.
preproc.missing_then: Une expression 'If' ou 'Elseif' doit être suivie du mot-clé 'Then'
preproc.misplaced_elseif: Un bloc 'ElseIf' ne peut être utilisé qu'après un bloc 'If' précédent dans la même portée.
preproc.misplaced_else: Un bloc 'Else' ne peut être utilisé qu'après un bloc 'If' ou 'ElseIf' précédent dans le même but
preproc.misplaced_case: Une instruction 'Case' ne peut être utilisée qu'à l'intérieur d'un bloc 'Switch' ou 'Select'
preproc.misplaced_continuecase: Une déclaration 'ContinueCase' ne peut être utilisée qu'à l'intérieur du champ d'application d'un bloc 'Case'
preproc.misplaced_exitloop: L'instruction 'ExitLoop' doit être placée à l'intérieur d'une boucle (par exemple 'For', 'Do' ou 'While')
preproc.misplaced_continueloop: L'instruction 'ContinueLoop' doit être placée dans une boucle (par exemple 'For', 'Do' ou 'While')
preproc.invalid_global: Une variable globale ne peut pas être déclarée dans le champ d'application local. Envisager soit de remplacer 'Global' par 'Local' ou 'Dim', soit de supprimer complètement le modificateur de portée.
preproc.no_closing_csharp: Le bloc C# actuellement ouvert n'a pas été fermé correctement en utilisant une directive '#ce[csharp]'.
preproc.csharp_requires_unsafe: A inline-C# code block can only be used when compiled with the compiler-flag '--unsafe' or '-u'.
preproc.pinvoke_no_lib: No library has been specified for the P/Invoke function '{0}'.
preproc.pinvoke_no_sig: No function signature has been specified for the P/Invoke function '{0}'.
preproc.missing_endfunc: There are at least {0} missing 'EndFunc'-statement(s) to close the open function(s).
preproc.fatal_internal_funcparsing_error: A mayor fatal function parsing error occured. It is not your fault.
preproc.unknown_directive: The preprocessor directive '#{0}' is unknown or could not be parsed.
preproc.certificate_nfound: The SNK/PFX certificate file '{0}' could not be found or is inaccessible.
preproc.directive_requires_unsafe: The directive '#{0}' can only be used when compiled with the compiler-flag '--unsafe' or '-u'.
preproc.directive_requires_debug: The directive '#{0}' can only be used when compiled with the compiler-flag '--debug' or '-d'.
preproc.dependency_invalid: The .NET dependency '{0}' could not be found or is invalid. Please verify whether the file has a valid PE and .NET header.
preproc.invalid_namepsace: The .NET namespace '{0}' has an invalid format.

astproc.unknown_entity: Internal error: The entity '{0}' is unknown.
astproc.parser_error: The expression '{0}' could not be parsed due to the following reason: {1}
astproc.obj_expression_required: The expression '{0}' is not a valid object-expression.
astproc.multiple_switch_case_else: A 'Case Else'-statement can only defined once for each Switch-block.
astproc.no_comma_allowed: The expression '{0}' must be a single-value expression and must not be multiple comma-seperated values.
astproc.no_range_allowed: The expression '{0}' must be a single-value expression and must therefore not contain the range-specific keyword 'To'.
astproc.func_not_declared: The function '{0}' has not been declared or could not be found. Did you forget to include a header?
astproc.parser_error_funcdecl: The function parameter expression(s) '{0}' could not be parsed due to the following reason: {1}
astproc.reserved_call: The function '{0}' is reserved for internal calls only.
astproc.not_enough_args: The function '{0}' expects at least {1} arguments, however, only {2} were given.
astproc.no_range_as_init: The initialization expression is invalid, as it is a value range instead of an single-valued expression.
astproc.missing_value: Constant variables must be initialized with a value upon declaration.
astproc.variable_exists: The variable '{0}' has already been declared prior to this statement (see {1}).
astproc.init_invalid_operator: Variables cannot be initiliazied with the operator '{0}'. Use the operator '=' instead.
astproc.init_invalid_expression: Variables can only be initialized using simple assignments or array declarations.
astproc.unsafe_func: The function '{0}' can only be used when compiled with the compiler-flag '--unsafe' or '-u'.
astproc.invalid_system: The function call cannot be used, when targeting a {0} system, as the function is specific for only the following platform(s): {1}.
astproc.pinvoke_sig_invalid: The signature '{0}' is not valid for the P/Invoke function '{1}'.
astproc.dllcall_odd_argc: The function 'DllCall' requires an odd amount of arguments.
astproc.dllcall_const_args: The function 'DllCall' currently requires constant string arguments for the entry point and type names. This will be fixed in the near future.
astproc.dllcall_assign: The function 'DllCall' cannot be λ-assigned to a variable.
astproc.trailing_comma: Invalid trailing comma in the declaration expression.
astproc.init_no_dynamic_dimensions: Array initalization dimensions must be compile-time static, when providing the initial values using the '... = [ ... ]' notation.
astproc.init_internal_error: Some internal error occured during the parsing of the array initialization expression
astproc.init_dimension_mismatch: The dimension no. {0} in the definition does not match the provided one: The size {1} was provided in the definition, however the according dimension in the initialization expression has the size {2}.
astproc.variable_is_const: The value cannot be assigned to the variable or parameter '{0}', as it has been marked as constant.
astproc.start_func_args: The start function '{0}' must not have any mandatory arguments. Optinonal parameters are allowed.
astproc.exit_func_args: The exit function '{0}' must not have any mandatory arguments. Optinonal parameters are allowed.
astproc.ast_error:
The following critial error occured during the parsing of the interal partial abstract syntax tree:
{0}
astproc.enum_inval_stepop: The step operator '{0}' is invalid for an enum declaration.
astproc.enum_inval_stepval: The step value '{0}' could not be parsed.
astproc.enum_div_zero: The step operator-value-combination is invalid due to a division by zero.
astproc.enum_inval_expr: The expression '{0}' is invalid for an enum declararion or could not be parsed.
astproc.fatal_codegen: A fatal internal error occured duing code generation.
astproc.mismatch_parcount: The parameter count for the call of the function '{0}' is {1}, however {2} parameter(s) are required.

generator.cannot_create: The intermediate code represenation could not be created, as one or more fatal compiler errors occured.
generator.cannot_create_dotnet: The engine could not create the .NET project system. Exit code {0} (0x{0:x8})
generator.build_failed: The .NET project system build failed. Exit code {0} (0x{0:x8})
generator.target_deprecated: The target system '{0}' is deprecated and therefore no longer supported.
generator.key_not_found: The private/public key pair '{0}' could not be found.
generator.obsolete_func: The function '{0}' is obsolete. Please use the function(s) '{1}' instead.
generator.invalid_jump: The code around this line has been compiled down to a set of invalid 'jump'-instructions. This is usually a sign of a misplaced 'ExitLoop'- or 'ContinueLoop'-Statement.

preproc.no_closing_comment: The currently open comment block has not been closed properly using an '#ce'-directive. It has been closed implicitly.
preproc.exit_level_truncated: The exit level {0} is too high. It has been truncated to level {1}.
preproc.exit_level_invalid: The exit level '{0}' could not be parsed or is lower than 1. The statement has therefore been ignored.
preproc.continue_level_truncated: The continuation level {0} is too high. It has been truncated to level {1}.
preproc.continue_level_invalid: The continuation level '{0}' could not be parsed or is lower than 1. The statement has therefore been ignored.
preproc.invalid_local: A local variable cannot be declared in the global scope. Consider either replacing 'Local' with 'Global' or 'Dim', or removing the scope modifier completely.

astproc.expression_result_discarded: The result of this expression is implicitly discarded. Consider assigning the expression to a local or global variable.
astproc.pinvoke_already_declared: The P/Invoke function accessing the function '{0}' in '{1}' has already been declared preivously. Consider removing the current line from the code.
astproc.multiple_select_default: Multiple 'Case Else'- or pseudo-'Case Else'-statements ('Case'-statements with constant 'true'-expressions) are defined. Consider optimizing or refactoring your code.

generator.failed_clean_output: The non-empty output folder '{0}' could not be cleaned, as the compiler-flag '--clean-output' or '-c' was not given.
generator.kpanic: This function call will invoke a kernel panic on UNIX systems and a blue screen on WINDOWS systems. Be warned.
generator.obsolete_func: The function '{0}' is obsolete. Please use the function(s) '{1}' instead.
generator.zero_deref: The expression '{0}' evaluates to 'Null' or 'Zero' and will cause an error upon derefencing at runtime.
generator.zero_div: The expression '{0}' will result in a division-by-zero error at runtime.

warnings.func_not_impl: This function is currently not yet implemented.
warnings.not_impl: This feature is currently not yet implemented.

notes.optimized_away: This statement or block has been optimized away be the compiler, as it does not have any effect on the execution flow. Consider removing it from the source code.
notes.empty_block: This block is either empty or has been optimized away. Consider removing it from the source code.
notes.uncalled_function: The function '{0}' will never be called.
notes.unsafe_execute: Calling the function 'Execute' is considered unsafe and is quite resource-intensive. Consider refactoring the code to remove the call.
notes.empty_function: The function '{0}' contains no statements. Consider removing it from the source code, as it has no effect on the program's semantics.
notes.unnecessary_function_comp: The function '{0}' only exists to keep compatibility with the AutoIt3-specification, but can be safely removed due to implementation optimizations.
notes.init_0_dim: At least one of the {0} array dimensions has the size 0. That does not make much sense and the initialization expression has therefore been ignored.
notes.global_return: The return value of the global code will be ignored except when being called from inside an 'Execute'-call.
notes.alias_function: The function '{0}' is an alias of the function '{1}' in order to maintain compatibility with AutoIt3. It is advised to use '{1}' instead.
notes.unnecessary_function_param: The function parameter no. {0} of the function call '{1}' only exists to keep compatibility with the AutoIt3-specification, but can be safely removed due to implementation optimizations.
notes.net_regex: This expression depends upon RegEx evaluation. The results can vary from the official AutoIt3-specification, as RegEx functions are implemeneted using the .NET RegEx engine.
